marklogic.body:
The Argentine claim to the Falklands/Malvias is just weird. They never even owned it.
If they are so bothered about territorial "justice" why don't they give back the land they took from Paraguay in 1864-1870 when Brazil, Bolivia and Argentina ganged up on Paraguay, killing Off 300,000 of its 500,000 population?Â - making it officially the most nationally destructive war in modern history. This issue is hardly in the Argentine press. It's not even really in the Paraguayan press, it's just regarded as history. People move on - so what's this ever-Burning anger about how the Brits robbed the precious precious little islands from Argentina? It's just cloud-cuckoo propaganda land. Embarassing fail.
